op.title: Optimized Gear Combinations
content: The best possible combination of gear to equip against each monster type for maximum optimization:
\> **NSoD** = Necrotic Sword of Doom; Burning Blade of Abezeth can be used instead if you don't have it, though it's slightly weaker.
\> **CPC** = Celestial Pirate Commander and all its items; Archfiend Deathlord (AFDL2) and its items can be used instead, they're exactly the same.
\> **SDKA** = Sepulchure's DoomKnight Armor; Arch DoomKnight can be used instead if you don't have it, though it's slightly weaker.
\> **AFDL** =  Archfiend Doomlord, armor only; its other items can be used instead if you don't have the armor, though they're weaker.
\> **BLoD** = Blinding Light of Destiny and its variants. Nothing can be used instead. How do you not fucking have this.

fdgraph.title: DPS over time Graph
fdgraph.description: Note: The green is CCM and the Purple is IC.

darkmode.title: Dark mode for Grimoire Guide
darkmode.description:
For those who wanna use Dark Mode for Grimoire,
here are the steps in order to get the mode (in the video):

guides.title: Compedium of Guides
guides.description:
Guides related to farming, membership, reputation,
etc..., can be found here:

header.1: This is a shorter version of the guide for players that wish to take the beeline to BLoD with no hesitation.
header.2: *Ignore this if you have already completed this saga.*

content.1:
\> Complete the [DoomWood storyline](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/story:doomwood).
\> Obtain the [Reinforced badge](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/bolbadge:20) to do the first three quests.
content.2:
\> The next two quests are self explanatory.
\> Get `40 Bone Dust` and `25 Undead Essences`.
\> **Repeat** one of these quests until you get `100 Spirit Orbs`.
content.3:
\> Get `100 Spirit Orbs`
\> Turn them in for your first `Loyal Spirit Orb`.
content.4:
\> You're now at the longest part of getting BLoD.
\> Farm at least `10,500 Spirit Orbs`.
\> **Recommendation**: Do the [**Soul Searching quest**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/yara-s-quests#3) from /BattleUnderC.
\> Stack them to `1000 Undead Essences`.
\> Turn them in for `Spirit Orbs` at /Necropolis.
content.5:
\> While farming the 10,500 Spirit Orbs...
\> Complete the [**Mine Crafting daily quest**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/artix-s-quests#27) every day.
\> Do the quests until you have these metals: `Copper`, `Barium`, and `Silver`.
content.6:
\> Once you have the `10,500 Spirit Orbs` and the `three metals`...
\> Start the [**Destiny Weapon Construction.**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/artix-s-quests#29)
content.7:
\> Get [Celestial Copper](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/celestial-copper).
\> Merge `10,500 Spirit Orbs` into `2 Bright Auras` and `5 Loyal Spirit Orbs`.
content.8:
\> Goto /Dwarfhold and head to [**Geopetal**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/geopetal).
\> Merge for the `Celestial Copper of Destiny`.
content.9:
\> Turn in the Celestial Copper of Destiny Quest at Necropolis.
\> *This just checks that you have created the `Celestial Copper of Destiny`. You are required to complete one of one these quests once only*.
content.10:
\> Complete the [**Weapon Kit quests**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/artix-s-quests#29).
\> Each destiny Weapon allows you to quickly farm certain types of ingredients.
\> You will need one of each Kit per Blinding Weapon.
\> (`3 Basic`, `3 Advanced`, and `4 Ultimate's` as you require one for BLoD).
content.11:
\> Merge the `Mace of Destiny` -> `Bright Mace of Destiny` -> `Blinding Mace of Destiny`.
\> You may need to do Ultimate Weapon Kit a few more times to obtain any required Bright Auras, Loyal Spirit Orbs and Spirit Orbs.
content.12:
\> Repeat steps 7, 8, and 11 for `Blade of Destiny` and `Bow of Destiny`. This time you will need different metals to obtain different destiny weapons.
\> Use your `Mace of Destiny` for [**Finding Fragments with the Mace**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/artix-s-quests#30) to get `Brilliant Auras` as you need them for the Blade and Bow.
content.13:
\> You're almost done! Use the [**Finding Fragments Quests**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/artix-s-quests#30) from each of your Blinding Weapons until you get all requirements needed for BLoD.
\> The `Blinding Aura` on the other hand is a low % drop from any of the Finding Fragment quests.
content.14: \> Complete the quest for `Blinding of Light Destiny`!
content.15:
\> Accept the `Get Your Blinding Light of Destiny` item and open your Book of Lore badges and find the [**Destiny is Blinding Badge**](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/bolbadge:82) to open the BLoD shop.
\> Buy the [Blinding Light of Destiny](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/blinding-light-of-destiny-axe)
